SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{boardType}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_SEQ,BOARD_TYPE,BOARD_CATEGORY, ID,BOARD_REG_ID,BOARD_REF,BOARD_STEP, BOARD_DEPTH, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT,BOARD_DEL) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL,#{boardType},#{boardCategory}, 'aaa','aaa', 0, 0, 0, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, SYSDATE, 0, 1)
INSERT INTO BOARD_IMAGES (IMAGES_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, IMAGES_PATH, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_IMAGES.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(BOARD_SEQ) FROM BOARD), #{imagesPath}, 'aaa', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle},BOARD_CONTENTS=#{boardContents},BOARD_UPD_ID=#{boardUpdId}, BOARD_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, BOARD_DEL=0 WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{boardSeq}
